map_residues.py - liftover for residues¶

Author:Andreas Heger
Release:$Id$
Date:April 02, 2014
Tags:Python

Purpose¶

maps a list of residues in a master sequence based on an explicit (multiple) alignment.

Options:

-m, --master    number of sequence to use as master (default is first row)
-f, --format    alignment format (plain is the default and so far the only
                supported option)

Usage¶

Example:

python map_residues.py --help

Type:

python map_residues.py --help

for command line help.

Command line options¶

map_residues.py - liftover for residues
=======================================

:Author: Andreas Heger
:Release: $Id$
:Date: |today|
:Tags: Python

Purpose
-------

maps a list of residues in a master sequence based on an explicit
(multiple) alignment.

Options::

    -m, --master    number of sequence to use as master (default is first row)
    -f, --format    alignment format (plain is the default and so far the only
                    supported option)       

Usage
-----

Example::

   python map_residues.py --help

Type::

   python map_residues.py --help

for command line help.

Command line options
--------------------

option --no-usage not recognized
